subject: Sailboats and Sailing
America's Cup
lead_paragraph: Under new rules for the 2017 America’s Cup, the defending champion, Oracle Team USA, will be able to race against challengers in early rounds and gain a 1-point lead for the final match.
snippet: Under new rules for the 2017 America’s Cup, the defending champion, Oracle Team USA, will be able to race against challengers in early rounds and gain a 1-point lead for the final match.
